dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation]
dmca.body:
Nc (thank goodness, considering the image) 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 30, 2005 1:50 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; seiwert@xs4all.nl
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright violation
Date: Thu, 30 Jun 2005 09:17:49 +0200
From: Harald Seiwert <seiwert@xs4all.nl>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Good morning,
I've mailing to you because one of your customers (ip address: 67.19.5.51)
is violating my copyright for quite a while without that I have a chance to
contact him (I suppose that his informations on a "who-is" site is fake).
The person in question is Les Nortan and his site is "boredshitless.com"
On this joke site there is placed a photo from my art set "cumrades", my
name  and copyrightsymbol was removed and it is published via internet
without my permission.
You can find the photo here:
http://www.boredshitless.com/gallery/New-Gallery/displayimage.php?pos=-1213
Any attemp to contact the owner of this site failed (links or phonenumbers
don't work). Via a "who-is" search I found out that the ip-address uses you
as a registration service provider, so I will ask you to remove the photo or
inform Les Nortan to remove the photo or give me the necessary information
to contact mr. Nortan.
Below is the full information I've found on the "who-is" site.

Thank you for your cooperation

Kind regards
Harald Seiwert

- ----------who -s search "boredshitless.com":
Alexa Trend/Rank:     177,066 (1 Month)   139,842 (3 Month)
DMOZ Directory:    Time_Wasting
DMOZ Title:    BoredShitless.com
DMOZ Description:    Variety of jokes, spoof ads, pranks and anagrams.
Additional Information:    Blocked
Robots.txt:    www.boredshitless.com/robots.txt
Website Status:    Active
Reverse IP:    Web server hosts 53 websites (reverse ip tool requires free
login)
Server Type:    Apache/1.3.29 (Unix) mod_python/2.7.10 Python/2.2.2
mod_webapp/1.2.0-dev mod_perl/1.29 mod_throttle/3.1.2 PHP/4.3.4
FrontPage/5.0.2.2510 mod_ssl/2.8.16 OpenSSL/0.9.7d (Spry.com also uses
Apache)
IP Address:    67.19.5.51 (ARIN & RIPE IP search)
IP Location:     - Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc
Blacklist Status:    Clear
Whois History:    7 records stored
Record Type:    Domain Name
Monitor:    Monitor or Backorder
Wildcard search:    'boredshitless' or 'bored shit less' in all domains.
Other TLDs:
.com    .net    .org    .info    .biz    .us
X            X             [4 available domains]
Name Server:    NS1.HOSTPOD.COM NS2.HOSTPOD.COM
ICANN Registrar:    TUCOWS INC.
Created:    04-jun-2002
Expires:    04-jun-2007
Status:    REGISTRAR-LOCK

Registrant:

 Newbury,  RG19 3QZ
 GB
